ValidationRule.description: 00263766: Sales Phase: Win the case (Negotiate) Phase Status: Pending Win/Loss Declaration
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Win the Case (Negotiate)'),
OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,'Not Submitted'),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,'Rejected'),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,'Cancelled')),
ISPICKVAL(Phase_Status__c,'Pending Win/Loss Declaration'),
Approvals_Current_Status__c!='Approved G5 Contract',
$Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Sales Phase manually. Please submit for approval first.
